ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] OT (Prices)
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I do.  Necro Eudrite.  Why? at 8th level my eye problem disappears.  and i have more mana  :) Paul ... From: Kimes, Dean W. To: eqbards@egroups.com
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I do. Necro Eudrite. Why? at 8th level my eye problem disappears. and i have more mana :)

Paul
----- Original Message -----
From: Kimes, Dean W.
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Sent: Wednesday, May 24, 2000 1:15 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT (Prices)


I know. It's weird they are really awesome pieces for a necro, but who
plays human or erudite necros?

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 24, 2000 1:58 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT (Prices)


The hardest part is finding someone who can wear and wants them.
We're having problems giving them away in our guild.
